item.title: A scholar
item.description: A Scholar My job is thinking and talking. I do reading and writting. I like learning and teaching.

item.title: A scholar
item.description: The society of Mind Listening to an old professor who devoted his whole life looking for the holy grail couldn’t find it handing over scattered clues to young, ignorant yet ambitious students like once he was in the hope that allowed more time he could see how minds work knowing that his time is over.
